questions.question: Set on a winter island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates' conflict with a corrupt royal family and a rebel army. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This former captain of the Sun Pirates and fish-man is known for his tragic past and his nickname 'Jinbe the Knight of the Sea'. Who is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
